title: Monday Post Show (06-14-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (06-14-21)
description:
Bobby talks to Raymundo about how he was confronted by a guy after he was busted for staring at him at brunch. Raymundo says he also may be dropped by his clothing line for getting a little too crazy at Mike D’s wedding online. Morgan2 also spotted a country star working out at the boxing gym. Bobby also offers Lunchbox money to box Morgan2. We also explore our Instagram “Explore” pages to find out about ourselves.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
